page.title: 06A day in Oakley School
page.content: On a usual school day l come by car to school.I play until the whistle goes. Then our teacher calls the register.We usually do Maths or English. After play we swop over our Maths and English. At 12.00 We have our school dinners.Most of our class have sandwiches, six people have school dinners.We have a play after dinner till 1.00pm. Sometimes we play skipping or schools or play ball as we are allowed to bring a tennis ball. We make up games of our own things like adventure stories.Usually the boys play football.Then we go in to school. Sometimes we hear a story or do art.After that we have another play at 2.00pm.Then we either do unexpected work, drama,music, games or swimming in our school swimming pool.
